listing.listing_description: With stunning views of the Turks and Caicos Banks, a unique modern layout and exotic accents, villa Balinese is an unforgettable retreat. Located on Ocean Drive on Providenciales and laid out around a private infinity pool, the spacious three-bedroom villa pairs striking interiors with a gorgeous oceanfront setting. Though the property has its own access to the water, there’s also a beach just minutes away.The centerpiece of Balinese is an infinity pool and hot tub that looks out over the ocean. It’s bordered by a large terrace furnished with daybeds and crossed by an arched bridge. Follow a set of steps down to a gazebo and, further down, access to the ocean. Cooks will appreciate the propane barbecue and kitchen with Viking appliances, while everyone can enjoy the villa’s air conditioning.Inside, the heart of the home is the great room, a stunning space with vaulted ceilings, pearl-stone tile walls, travertine marble floors and pocket doors that open to the pool terrace. Large, minimalist white sofas are a tempting spot to sit and enjoy the sea breezes, while patterned cushions and Asian antiques add exotic interest and a hidden television lends an element of surprise. The simple dining area features woven chairs around a sturdy wooden table for textural appeal, and the kitchen has dark, dramatic cabinets and countertops, plus a practical island.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, television, ocean view and a private terrace or balcony. The master bedroom has a king bed, private terrace, and pool access, while the other two bedrooms each have a queen bed and private balcony. For privacy, the master bedroom is located in one wing, while the other two bedrooms are in a separate wing on the opposite side of the house.From the villa’s location on Ocean Drive, it’s just seconds to the water, a 2-minute drive to the beach and a 7-minute drive to the tennis court, golf course or grocery store. A 10-minute drive will bring you to restaurants and a hospital, and the international airport on Providenciales is only 12 minutes away by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Like an automatic filter, sunshine casts a golden glow over pool, patio, and great room at this Italian-inspired villa on a St. John hillside. It’s one of several villas clustered like a Mediterranean hilltop town above the harbor, commanding views over the ocean to neighboring St. Thomas. Walk to the shared clubhouse or drive down to dining and the ferry docks in Cruz Bay.Watch boats move through the channel and birds flit across the sky from the two-level terrace, which features plenty of loungers gathered around the private swimming pool, plus a barbecue and alfresco table that invite you to stay out and watch the sunset.Double doors lead from the sun-splashed warmth of the terrace into the shade of the great room, whose polished marble floors are cool underfoot. Settle into the sofa and chairs here, plan the next day’s adventures around a dining table for 6, or refuel before the next activity at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.It’s a short walk from the villa to the fitness center and clubhouse at The Hills for a few laps in the shared pool, a stint on the rowing machine, or a cocktail at the bar. Drive or take a taxi down to Cruz Bay to stroll amid shops and restaurants or to arrange a snorkeling or diving excursion. You can also set off to one of the 7 beaches within a 9-kilometer drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Capturing breathtaking views of Guana Bay Point, this luxurious six bedroom is the perfect destination for a sunny Caribbean getaway in beautiful St. Martin. Villa Amalia is located minutes from duty-free shopping, vibrant nightlife, and pristine beachfront on Guana Bay Beach. And, it’s just twelve kilometers from St. Martin’s bustling capital, Marigot.Drawing influence from its colonial heritage, Villa Amalia displays traditional Spanish revivalist design. Similar to the mansions of Beverly Hills, this villa is all about luxury, and the appreciation of its beautiful natural surroundings. Soothing white walls, rounded archways, and a red-clay roof provide the perfect contrast to the vibrant blues and greens of the Caribbean. With openings to outdoor spaces in nearly every room, you’ll have no trouble filling Amalia with the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. Inside, you’ll appreciate the elegant marble flooring, peaked wood ceilings, and high-end furniture and electronics. Spacious living rooms and smaller sitting areas make it easy for guests to gather as a group or break-away for more intimate moments. And, no matter where you decide to spend your time, the amazing ocean view is right there with you.Villa Amalia’s six bedrooms all feature en-suite bathrooms, king or queen-sized beds, and all but one have scenic ocean views. At dinner, there’s formal and alfresco dining, and indoor and outdoor sound systems to set the perfect tone. After dinner, stay inside and enjoy the pool table, dart board, ping pong table, exercise room, and spa, or you could venture to the terrace for a swim in the saltwater infinity pool. During your stay, you’ll have the assistance of daily housekeeping, chef services, and a pool keeper.The nearest town to Villa Amalia is Philipsburg, the capital of the island’s Dutch side. There, you’ll find a beautiful boardwalk lined with beachfront bars, duty-free shopping, and Casino Rouge et Noir. After Philipsburg, head north to St. Martin’s French side and check out their capital, Marigot, where you’ll find the Marigot Market, a wide range of dining establishments, water sports activities, and more.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: For travelers seeking luxury and escape on the Mexican Riviera, the Punta Mita Resort has become the most exclusive destination. Among the coveted residential properties here, one of the finest is this newly renovated Hacienda de Mita villa, a beachfront vacation rental with panoramic ocean views and exquisite interior design.The villa's covered terrace gazes out at the azure waters of the Bay of Banderas. With comfortable lounge furniture and an elegantly simple table for eight, the terrace is ideal for alfresco dining with family and friends, or sipping evening cocktails in the palm-filtered breeze. The terracotta-potted plants and elegant wicker armchairs evoke the earthy richness of local Mexican tradition. Below you, Hacienda de Mita's shared swimming pool abuts the white-sand beach.The terrace transitions seamlessly into the open-plan living area, where the vaulted wooden ceiling beams seem like ocean-vessel oars, and gorgeous abstract paintings evoke the rhythms of the sea. The furnishings are natural, comfortable, and beautifully harmonious. A dining table for eight, with chairs of wood and woven leather, is perfect for ocean-view dining, while the kitchen, with its richly hued cabinetry, has a breakfast bar for three. The villa is particularly well-equipped for relaxing entertainment, with surround sound system, iPod docking station, and a 65-inch 4K SUHD TV with Netflix, Blu-Ray 4K DVD player, and DVD library.The bedrooms are comfortable but cool, with naturalistic color palettes that echo sea, sky, and earth. The master bedroom features king size bed, ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and jetted bathtub, and French doors that open to a terrace with a spectacular ocean view. There is also a second bedroom with king bed and partial ocean view, a bedroom with two queen beds, and a fourth room with charming twin bunk beds—all with ensuite bathrooms.With its prime location by the beach within the exclusive scope of Punta Mita, the villa gives you access to two Jack Nicklaus Championship Golf Courses as well as to St. Regis Beach, Kupuri Beach, and both the Resident's and Hacienda de Mita Beach Clubs. You can also walk five minutes to the Village of Punta de Mita. For fishing, surfing, kayaking, hiking, and rain forest adventures, Punta Mita is ideally situated.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Discover the best of Puerto Vallarta’s scenery and style at Villa Amapas South. Set on the beach in the Conchas Chinas area, the property has panoramic views over the Pacific and welcoming hacienda-inspired design. Five bedrooms can accommodate up to fourteen guests, but larger parties can reserve neighboring Villa Amapas North for more space.You’ll want to spend most of your stay on the terrace off the villa’s great room, which has ocean views, a heated infinity pool, plenty of chaise longues, a barbecue and a shaded outdoor dining area. For entertainment, there’s a bar, satellite television, sound system and Wi-Fi, and for convenience, the villa has a water purification system, air conditioning, ceiling fans and an elevator. Your stay at Villa Amapas South includes housekeeping and cook service for breakfast, dinner and happy hour.The villa’s traditional tiled roof and terracotta-colored walls are matched on the inside by hacienda-inspired earth tones and tiled floors. The great room, which opens to the terrace via wide sliding glass doors, has a large, comfortable sectional and casual wicker armchairs at one end, and a dining area with seating for ten at the other. The fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and welcoming vibe, with stone countertops, a large range and pretty tile backsplashes.Each of the four main bedrooms at Villa Amapas South has an en-suite bathroom, ceiling fan, access to a terrace and ocean views. On the ground floor, the bedroom has a king bed, and on the second floor, the bedroom has two queen beds and air conditioning. The master bedroom on the third floor has a king bed and air conditioning, and on the fourth floor, you’ll find a bedroom with a queen bed, two single beds and air conditioning. The fifth bedroom is on the ground floor and has two single beds.Thanks to the villa’s oceanfront location, it’s just a 10-minute walk to Conchas Chinas Beach and Los Muertos Beach. By car, it’s 6.4 km to Playa Camarones and about 10.3 km to Playa de Oro. If you’d like to take advantage of the Mexican sunshine to golf, it’s a 24 km drive to Nuevo Vallarta Golf Course and Mayan Palace Golf Course and an 28.4 km drive to Flamingos Golf Course. Take a stroll around downtown Puerto Vallarta, 10.3 km away, or the Vallarta Botanical Gardens, 21.6 km away. It’s just over 2 km from the villa to the nearest hospital, and 13.1 km to the Puerto Vallarta International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that Amapas South can be rented together with Amapas North (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/mexico/puerto-vallarta/conchas-chinas/villa-amapas-north-115437).

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is near a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Built to capture incredible ocean views, Villa Skyline is a modern paradise. Located in Turks and Caicos, on the western edge of Grace Bay, Villa Skyline is perfect for a family getaway, couples retreat, or even a romantic, island honeymoon with a little extra space. Nearby, you’ll find duty-free shopping, Casablanca Casino, exciting nightlife, and the beautiful beachfront of Grace Bay. Sleek and stylish, Villa Skyline is a trendsetting estate, outfitted with state of the art electronics, designer furniture, and a minimalistic approach to decor, focusing on quality over quantity. The second-floor living room is a spacious, open concept area that flows to the kitchen, dining area and beyond to the entrance foyer. All of these spaces feature wide openings to the terrace and balcony, allowing the fresh breeze, natural sunlight, and ocean views to provide refreshing atmosphere throughout the interior. The three levels of balcony make it easy to find solitude to work on your tan or host group gatherings and social events. All three bedrooms have incredible ocean views as well.Outside, you’ll love cooling off in Skyline’s refreshing swimming pool, lounging in the hot tub, and gazing upon the endless ocean view from a sunbed. Back inside, Skyline is equipped with air conditioning, Wi-Fi, cable television, and a sound system. There’s also a fitness room and office space if you need to keep up with any daily routines.Grace Bay Beach, just a few minutes from home, features calm waters with a clear, sandy bottom that is perfect for families and casual swimming. If you’re interested in diving or snorkeling, the barrier reef on the outskirts of the bay are buzzing with aquatic life, but only accessible by boat. If there’s a golfer in your party, Provo Golf Club has the island’s only course and consistently ranks among the Caribbean’s top ten.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Indulge in a resort-worthy experience at Villa Amapas North. Set on the ocean in the famous Conchas Chinas in Puerto Vallarta, the three-bedroom villa welcomes you with a full staff, charming architecture and decor and suite-style bedrooms with ocean views. To accommodate the whole family, the villa can be rented with its sister property, Villa Amapas South.Your stay at Villa Amapas North includes cook service, housekeeping, a houseman and night watchman and one transfer from and to the airport, leaving you free to relax in the beautifully landscaped outdoor living area. The villa opens to an oceanfront terrace with a row of lounge chairs, heated infinity pool, bar, barbecue and two dining areas, one formal and another one alfresco. Fountains and a garden invite peaceful contemplation, but you can also work up a sweat in the fitness area. For entertainment, there’s satellite television, a DVD player and Wi-Fi, and to ensure your comfort, the villa has an elevator, water purification system and air conditioning.The open living areas at Villa Amapas North are the perfect mix of casual and formal. In the living room, beamed ceilings, stone walls and a built-in sofa create a traditional spot to gather, but you can also open the wide Parota wood doors and nap on the wicker sofa while enjoying the ocean breeze. A unique stone rectangular dining table is a memorable setting for a special meal, while a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar is ready to handle a quick breakfast or snack time.On the villa’s ground floor, you’ll find a studio-suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, ocean views and terrace access. On the second floor, the Master Suite with a king size, beautifully framed by an intricate iron sculpture, en-suite bathroom with tub, ocean views and terrace access, and a second bedroom with two queen beds, ocean views and terrace access.From Villa Amapas North, it’s only a 10-minute walk to Los Muertos Beach and Zona Romantica (restaurant row), a 6.4 km drive to Playa Camarones and a 10.3 km drive to Playa de Oro. You’ll find assistance at the Medasist hospital, 2.3 km away, and shopping and dining in downtown Puerto Vallarta, 10.3 km away. Stroll the Vallarta Botanical Gardens, 21.6 km away, or play a round at Nuevo Vallarta Golf Course and Mayan Palace Golf Course, both 24 km away, or Flamingos Golf Course, 28.4 km away. Plan on an 13.1 km drive from Puerto Vallarta International Airport to the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.NOTE: Villa Amapas North can be rented together with Villa Amapas South (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/mexico/puerto-vallarta/conchas-chinas/villa-amapas-south-115438).

listing.listing_description: Perched up high on the seaside hills of Corossol, this St. Barts luxury villa is perfect for a romantic getaway, or honeymoon. With panoramic ocean views, Passage's balcony is an incredible vantage point for Caribbean sunsets. Just five minutes from shopping, restaurants, and nightlife in Gustavia, you'll have a prime location for exploring this iconic vacation destination. And, there are seven beautiful beachfront areas within two-to-ten kilometers of Passage.When your property is given a gift, like Passage's incredible ocean view, you design accordingly. Every room in this hillside villa faces, and opens to the ocean. Floor-to-ceiling glass doors dominate the exterior wall. When open, the entire living room and master bedroom have free-flowing access to the pool and balcony. Fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight easily fill the modern-minimalistic interior. Decorated with designer furniture, high-end electronics, and splashes of turquoise, Passage has a calming, yet elegant atmosphere. The kitchen features a wall of stylish cabinetry and fully integrated appliances. Between the lounge and the kitchen, the gorgeous modern wood dining table, with seating for eight, divides the space. And, on the other side of the villa, the master bedroom awaits, with a king-sized bed, en-suite, walk-in closet, and ocean view.Some of the other interior features include Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a dishwasher, and several television options. On the balcony, there's alfresco dining, lounge chairs, living areas, and a barbecue, all surrounding the refreshing infinity pool.Undoubtedly, Passage's ocean view will inspire you to get out and see it first hand. Luckily, you're in St. Barts, one of the world's finest beach vacation destinations. Within nine kilometers you'll be able to find eight amazing beachfront areas, the closest being St Jean Beach. Nikki, Gouverneur, and Flamands Beach are the most popular on the Island. Colombier is a great alternative, as it is accessible only by boat, or a twenty-minute hike beginning at the Port of Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sea splashes at the sand outside and marble tile splashes across the floors of this gated Mediterranean estate on Grand Cayman. The half-submerged chaises longues, the stools at the swim-up bar, and the outdoor TV angled toward the pool are perfectly positioned for comfort. Sail away from the dock of the Rum Point Club or stay to sip a mudslide at the bar that invented the cocktail.Your holiday begins with a welcome basket—plus perks like booster seats for the youngest family members—and continues around a pool with a swim-up bar, a wading pool, plenty of loungers, a gas barbecue, and al-fresco dining for twelve. Take the provided tandem kayaks out for a paddle around the bay, and relax by the smart TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi when you need a little shade.The villa makes a grand entrance with a sweeping double staircase leading to an island-side terrace, and the drama continues inside its 10,000 square feet of recently renovated living space. At the center is a double-height living room with an ocean-inspired blue-and-white color scheme, separated from the dining room and fully equipped kitchen by a bank of columns.This vacation rental has six bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms. There are also two bedrooms that share a bathroom with en-suite access from both: one with two queen beds, and one with two double bunk beds. All eight bedrooms have air conditioning and smart TVs, so you have the luxury of following the game without getting out of bed.Put your toes in the sand and relive your honeymoon with a stroll on the aptly named Barefoot Beach, right in front of the villa, or make the 2-minute drive to hammocks strung over white sands at Rum Point. Spend the day snorkeling the shallow bay, then reward yourself with a mudslide from Wreck Bar, which first blended the frozen concoction in the 1970s.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sitting on Anguilla’s South Shore, Odyssey - Kamique commands stunning views of a secluded beach cove and the mountains of St Martin. You will be just paces away from a private swath of cool white sand, complete with padded sun loungers, shaded day bed and gazebo. Dramatically nestled in the rolling landscape to form special enclaves, the surrounding waters at Odyssey are protected by a reef that offers calm waters and excellent snorkeling.Jump into an impressive rectangular infinity swimming pool, great for laps or just cooling off. Take advantage of the two outdoor showers as you make your way into ample patches of sun and shade overlooking the clear waters of the Caribbean. A gas barbeque sets the tone for some luscious alfresco dining. Indoors at Odyssey, you will find a home entertainment system and Wi-Fi. The villa is wheelchair accessible and makes a great bet for multigenerational families and diverse groups. Your reservation includes management, concierge and housekeeping services as well as daily continental breakfasts.The modern and chic interiors of Odyssey showcase a rich blend of woods, stone and concrete to create a sensual, yet modern island environment. A touch of the tropics provides a sense of romance at this idyllic escape. The atmosphere blurs the line between inside and out and orchestrates light and shade to create peaceful oases among the ongoing dance of chiaroscuro patterns.The four exquisite bedrooms at Odyssey accommodate up to eight fortunate guests. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans, televisions and complimentary l’Occitane toiletries. The two grand master suites each offer an outdoor shower with a private sunning area. Fall asleep with nothing but the sound of ocean waves as your soundtrack.During your stay at Odyssey - Kamique, you will be within easy reach of the beach and ocean, town and groceries as well as the CuisinArt Golf Course and Spa. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. History buffs can also stop in at the Heritage Museum or the Amerindian Ceremonial Site to take a glimpse into this island’s rich past. Come experience the best of Anguilla!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to Villa Paraiso Montezuma, a spectacular compound of over 20,000 square feet composed of multiple structures set over thirteen lush tropical acres in the stunning Nicoya Peninsula of Costa Rica. Renowned architect, Ronald Zurcher – perhaps best known for his design of Costa Rica’s only Four Seasons Hotel – has designed this holiday home to provide the ultimate private resort experience. From use of the resident horses to a private suspension bridge that cuts directly into town, this monumental vacation rental offers a unique perspective on getting away from it all!The infinity pool with a swim-up bar takes it to the next level. With a barbeque and television located inside the wet bar/outdoor kitchen, beer and burgers can be enjoyed while still soaking the pool. You’ll also find a wood burning oven that’s perfect for pizza time. Enjoy a workout, yoga or massage in the gym strategically placed atop a dramatic 100 yard cliff for unobstructed 180 degree Pacific Ocean views. Inside, you will also find a home entertainment unit, sound system and Wi-Fi. The impressive home theater room will make it a movie night to remember.The high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors keep the feelings airy and bright at this private home. The spacious interiors feature stately and comfortable furnishings in the living and formal dining areas. The expansive kitchen features gas hobs, a center island and a breakfast nook.Five exquisite bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, three with dazzling ocean views accommodating up to fourteen guests at this non-smoking villa. The master suite also features a jetted tub. Just a ten minute walk from the beach, Villa Paraiso makes a great bet for a family vacation, a golf getaway or a special event like a wedding.A 100 yard private suspension bridge was engineered to provide guests with a shortcut from the villa to the bohemian streets of Montezuma, which is known for its striking natural surroundings and wildlife where howler and white-faced Capuchin monkeys as well as colorful iguanas never seem more than a glance away. Come enjoy this taste of paradise with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: While staying at Cocoland, you’ll be treated to gorgeous water views and private relaxation areas with palm trees. Sitting on the hillside of Pointe Milou, this elegant home features plenty of sun and is one of our top St. Barts villas. Nestled in the Caribbean Sea, the island of St. Barts is known for its upscale appeal for being both private and prestigious.On warm afternoons, go for a dip in the large pool, it’s surrounded by a deck with lounge chairs and tropical greenery and overlooks the sea. The backyard also features a private lawn with seating areas and water views. In the evenings, take advantage of the upper-level patio’s alfresco dining area and have a barbecue.From the patio, step into the living room—it opens up to the terrace, perfectly blending the comforts of indoor and outdoor living. The decor is a mix of colonial and contemporary styles with plush sofas and accents done in soft, neutral colors. A second sitting room offers more sofas while the fully equipped kitchen has stainless steel appliances and plenty of counter space. You’ll also find extra gadgets like a dishwasher, ice maker, and an espresso machine for early morning lattes.Up to four guests can stay in the villa’s two bedrooms on either side of living room, allowing for maximum privacy. Both feature king-sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and televisions with DVD players.The beaches at St. Barts offer a bounty of activities from snorkeling to deep-sea fishing to wind surfing and sailing or simply just taking in some sun on the sand—the nearest one is just five minutes away. You’re also just 7.4 km to Gustavia, the island’s capital where you’ll find top-notch restaurants, shops and spas.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Manzu is located within the lush grounds of the Peninsula Papagayo in Costa Rica, a completely private sanctuary on a small peninsula of its own. Villa Manzu offers eight oversized suites spread across the 30,000 square feet Villa. There is plenty of room to spread out, from the two swimming pools and spa to the theater room and expansive bar/party room. The grounds are dotted with hammocks, chairs and restful areas, perfect for quiet moments taking in 180-degree sea views and watching monkeys cavort in the trees. Adventure guides will customize your stay to ensure that you live the Costa Rican adventure and immerse you in the Costa Rican culture. Villa Manzu is by far a superior experience as your stay at includes the services of a private chef, servers, bartender, butler, driver, and even an adventure specialist to arrange excursions. Spend your vacation hiking down to the beach, relaxing in the two heated pools and hot tub, practicing on the yoga platform or using the available sports equipment, from fishing and snorkeling gear to stand-up paddleboards, surfboards and kayaks. Catch a movie in the home theater, treat yourself to the sauna and steam room, work out in the fitness room and gather for a game in the recreation room. It is as if you are coming to the finest of boutique hotels yet have the place all to yourselves! Pricing is an all-encompassing price that allows for Villa Manzu staff to attend to all the needs of our guests with no further charges. This includes transportation needs, adventure guides, and toys to enjoy the Villa and surrounding beaches and property. The most wonderful part of the stay is the cuisine. We have an exceptional team of chefs that have been with us for many years now which all our visiting writers have raved upon. Custom menus prepared by our own exclusive executive chef team are included with every stay; as well as fresh homemade cuisine including fresh baked breads, sweets, and room snacks and mini bars. A butler team provides all day and evening service of hand choose fine wine, top shelf cocktail recipes, smoothies, local fruit drinks and more. Both the outdoor and indoor living spaces are decorated with modern shapes and neutral tones for a chic contemporary feel. In the living rooms, white upholstery and wicker and wood textures are set off by pink piping and patterned coral throw cushions. High ceilings and transom windows make the air-conditioned rooms feel airy and light, but full-length drapes and tailored area rugs anchor the look. The dining room has a formal stone-topped table and ocean views for elegant dinners, and the spacious kitchen has a long breakfast bar.There are six suites in the main house at Villa Manzu and two in a separate casita; each bedroom is a full oversized suite and each has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, mini bar with coffee service and walk-in closet. In the main house, two suites have California king beds, ocean views and balconies. The opulent bunk suite has two king beds and four twin beds along with ocean views. There are two additional suites, each of which has double california king beds. There is a sixth suite in the main house that has a California king bed. In the casita, there are two bedrooms with king beds, balconies and partial ocean views; along with a private living room. Guests of Villa Manzu have access to the Peninsula Papagayo golf and tennis clubhouse, marina and Prieta Beach Club, as well as the restaurants at the Four Seasons hotel, all about a half-mile away. There’s a beach 100 yards from the villa down a short hiking trail, and both Nacazcol Beach and Prieta Beach are a half-mile away by golf cart. A healthcare facility is 11 miles away, and the Liberia airport, downtown Liberia, Coco and a grocery store are 18 miles away.

listing.listing_description: Contemporary architecture frames stunning views of mountains and sea at Champagne Shores. This exquisite Blowing Point vacation rental shows off its oceanfront setting in thoughtfully designed indoor and outdoor living areas. Book the five-bedroom property separately for an island getaway, or with its sister villa, Beaches Edge East, to host a family reunion or intimate Anguilla destination wedding.Champagne Shores opens to a beautiful stone terrace with a private pool, hot tub and row of loungers looking out to the ocean and the neighboring island of St. Martin. Try out local seafood on the barbecue, and sit down to the shaded al-fresco dining area to enjoy. Inside, you’ll find a exercise room, wine fridge, sound system and Wi-Fi to help you relax or entertain.Walls of floor-to-ceiling windows and clean-lined architecture blur the lines between indoors and out at this luxury villa. Though the open-plan great room is well appointed with two sitting areas and a dining table that seats eight, the real focal point is the sea views that flood the space. The fully equipped modern kitchen even echoes the colors of the ocean in its sleek white cabinetry and turquoise backsplash and breakfast bar.Five bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and lounge areas, invite you to take a honeymoon from real life. There are three with king beds, including two with their own balconies overlooking the water, and two with queen beds. Touches like streamlined four-poster beds are a surprisingly contemporary update of traditional Caribbean style.WIth postcard-perfect beaches but no large resorts, Anguilla is a favorite destination for holidays truly away from it all. Take your time strolling the secluded beach area only steps from the villa, or make the short drive to the island’s world-class West End beaches. Book a table at one of the nearby restaurants, or a tee time at the Cuisinart Resort golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find the perfect pairing of simple design and spectacular views at Villa Ventanas al Mar. The name of this Puerto Vallarta vacation rental translates to “windows on the sea,” and it certainly delivers, commanding sweeping panoramas from its perch on a hillside in the exclusive Conchas Chinas area.This luxury property was designed for indoor-outdoor living, with expansive outdoor areas featuring a heated infinity pool, hot tub, loungers in the sun and shade, and a barbecue. After sunset, the satellite TV, sound system and Wi-Fi will keep you entertained inside. Your holiday at the villa also includes chef service at two meals each day, as well as the services of a housekeeper and a houseman acting as waiter, bartender and security.Villa Ventanas al Mar blends Spanish Colonial romance, sleek contemporary style and Asian influences for an eclectic yet unpretentious feel. Fold-away glass doors lead from the terrace into a welcoming open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen with a bar area. Not only does the layout allow warm breezes to flow through the space, but the glass doors frame the views to perfection.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, a terrace or balcony, and ocean views. Two of the bedrooms also have their own private lounge areas. The four suites can accommodate parties of up to eight friends or family members on holiday together.From the villa’s location in Conchas Chinas, it’s just over half a mile to the nearest beach: the quiet cove of Playa Conchas Chinas. A short drive will bring you to the sandy stretch of Playa Los Muertos, one of the most popular in the area, as well as oceanfront shopping and dining along the boardwalk in Puerto Vallarta.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superbly placed, modern and maritime-styled listing is located right on Ffryes Beach, one of Antigua’s very best. With storybook white sands and turquoise waters, guests can take advantage of a surfing, snorkeling and jet-skiing paradise, before retiring to the seaside terrace and crisp, cool infinity pool. The bright lights of St.Johns, the capital, are just 25 minutes drive away. This apartment is packed with possibilities for a small family / group of friends. From the entrance, guests can literally walk onto Ffryes Beach with towel in hand and choose a pristine spot to soak up the Carribean sun. After a dip in the wonderfully warm water, pick up an Antiguan speciality (jerk chicken, or freshly fried fish) from a beachside restaurant, before taking a short walk to the towering ruins of the local sugar windmill. Similarly, Tamarind Hills Silver is the perfect starting point for an island drive, taking in stunning seaside cliffs, leafty palm-covered hills, and cool drinks in welcoming roadside bars. Guests can also opt to enjoy Antigua’s famed hot weather and sea views from the listing itself, via a shaded sun lounger or by lingering in the pool. The apartment’s climate control is never more than a few steps away, where the airy balcony and ocean-view windows ensuring a true sense of place is established, with all the modern conveniences one would expect. When night comes, fire up the barbecue and try some of the Antiguan ways of cooking, with fresh food from the local market. On this island, nothing is ever too far, and the colourful streets of St.Johns just a short drive away, with its hive-of-activity markets, welcoming harbourside bars and the great buzz of game days at the Cricket Grounds. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located along Provo’s stunning Long Bay Beach, Pearl West is one of three homes within the Pearls of Long Bay Estate property. The perks at this luxury vacation rental have been set to overdrive for fun in the sun and pleasant repose. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve, next holiday, at this exclusive oceanfront property in the Turks and Caicos!The grounds at Pearl West include two swimming pools and a children’s wading pool. Or perhaps it’s time for a soothing soak in the therapeutic bubbles of the hot tub? Decked out for the consummate entertainer, you will also find the following: alfresco dining for eight, a pool bar, a Japanese teppanyaki cooking station, a barbeque, sun loungers, umbrellas, a beachside sound system and a children’s play set. The interiors of this elegant residence are equally impressive with a stunning home theater room with popcorn machine, cable television, an indoor/outdoor sound system and other divertissements including Netflix, Apple TV and a DVD/Blu-ray player. Your reservation includes housekeeping, and a private chef.Pearl West offers guests uninterrupted views of the turquoise waters spanning the Caicos Banks while marrying contemporary design with Caribbean barefoot luxury. This stunning home seamlessly harmonizes the idea of indoor/outdoor living with beautiful landscaping, decks and lagoons throughout for 12,000 square feet of sophisticated living. High vaulted ceilings and plenty of overhead fans keep the feelings airy and breezy.Eight exquisite bedroom suites accommodate up to twenty guests at this non-smoking villa. Access to the outdoors is a breeze! All of the suites offer dual vanities, televisions, Netflix and Apple TV. Sleep soundly with nothing but the ocean waves as your soundtrack!Pearl West shares first class amenities reminiscent of a five star resort with the other homes at this estate. Continue your workout regime in the state of the art 1,000 square foot gymnasium or get together for some tennis on the championship court. Relax in the Turkish steam bath, sauna or alfresco massage pavilion. The Provo Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Pearl West is ideal for a group of family or friends and can even serve as the locale for a dream wedding or a decadent honeymoon!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get the feel of a private island with the convenience of a location close to downtown Nassau, golf and shopping at Colonial Paradise. Set on a beautiful white-sand beach in an exclusive development with stunning water views, the chic contemporary villa truly lives up to its name. Four suite-style bedrooms and inviting modern interiors give the property boutique hotel-worthy appeal.During your stay at Colonial Paradise, a housekeeper, chef, property manager and even the captain of your own private boat (for local transport) are at your service. Start the day with a yoga session in the villa’s tropical gardens, a workout in the shared fitness facilities or a stroll on the beach that stretches just in front of the property and has views of Nassau and Atlantis. Cool off in the saltwater pool, take a boat trip from the private dock and, in the evenings, enjoy local seafood at the al-fresco dining area.Huge windows, an open-plan layout and neutral-toned furnishings give the villa’s interiors a beachy yet sophisticated vibe. In the living room and media room, clean-lined cream sofas and tables are sleek and modern, while subtle coral-print pillows and driftwood-hued wood paneling are nods to the seaside setting. There’s a formal dining area with wicker seating, a whimsical chandelier and ocean views, as well as a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the four bedrooms at Colonial Paradise has an en-suite bathroom. There are two master suites, each with a king bed, lounge area and ocean views, and a third bedroom with a king bed and patio. The fourth bedroom has two queen beds and its own lounge area. Wood floors, neutral tones and details like four-poster beds or tufted headboards give the bedrooms the comfort and feel of a stylish boutique hotel.A 10-minute boat ride takes you from downtown Nassau to Colonial Paradise. Once you’ve arrived at the villa, you’re on Colonial Beach and a 2-minute walk from Paradise Beach. Find what you need—or just want— at Paradise Shopping Plaza, just over 1.5 km away, relax at the Four Seasons Ocean Club, 2.6 km away or tee off at Paradise Island Golf Club, 3.5 km away. When you have to leave Paradise, it’s a 20.2 km trip to Lynden Pindling International Airport.Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/home-on-paradise-island-bahamas/)Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved._ Please note: You must take a boat ride to arrive at the property._

listing.listing_description: Holiday Exclusive – From December 17th 2016 to January 6th, 2017, this villa & travel dates have been reserved for our guests! You won't find availability for those dates anywhere else - inquire today for more information!Beach Enclave is located along coveted International Drive, a prestigious cul-de-sac known for its designer homes. The area offers stunning views of Turks and Caicos’ North Shore, the protected Princess Alexandra National Park and the teeming barrier reef. This private neighborhood offers tranquility with low density and scant traffic. Right on the oceanfront of Babalua Beach and less than ten minutes from Grace Bay, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate Caribbean holiday!The combination of private beach access, easy and breezy living and magnificent views along with the vacation rental’s luxury services and management make this property a one-of-a-kind real estate opportunity in Providenciales. Beach Enclave is generously embedded in the lush, natural vegetation of the islands with less than one home per acre. Outdoor perks include a swimming pool, an alfresco dining area for eight, a barbeque, fire pit, an outdoor shower and plenty of sun loungers. The private beach area is accessible via a carved limestone staircase.High ceilings and a predominantly white decorative scheme keep the feelings light and bright at this magnificent holiday home. Subtle wooden accents in the great room help keep the atmosphere balanced and grounded. Enjoy dinner at the formal dining table that is uniquely hewn to preserve the original shape and grains of the tree. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and an espresso machine. Wi-Fi access is free.The four stunning bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. The two master suites feature king size beds, dual vanities, alfresco showers and balconies. All of the suites offer television, ceiling fans and ocean views.Don’t forget – group yoga sessions are included with your reservation. Get into that meditative state you’ve been craving for so long! You will also be within easy driving distance of the Provo Golf Club. We recommend this villa for a family vacation, a decadent honeymoon or couples’ retreat or a special event such as a wedding or anniversary. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience Costa Rica’s famed pura vida in an eco-friendly way at Su Casa. Set on a hill with views of Playa Rajada in Guanacaste, the contemporary two-bedroom villa was constructed from indigenous woods and is surrounded by forest. Sleek interiors lined with floor-to-ceiling windows let the stunning views be the center of attention.The villa is surrounded by a deck with an infinity-edge plunge pool, charcoal grill, outdoor shower and chaise longues. Guests also have access to a shared fitness facility and tennis court, and Wi-Fi is available in the welcome center during its opening hours. For comfort and convenience, Su Casa has air-conditioned bedrooms and a washer and dryer.With wood-framed floor-to-ceiling windows and doors and a vaulted, beamed ceiling, Su Casa feels like a contemporary cabin. Sleek polished concrete floors in the open-plan living room, dining room and kitchen are warmed up by a cozy curved sectional, Danish-inspired upholstered chairs, a plush area rug and a honey-toned wood dining set. A generous island in the well-equipped kitchen is topped by a gorgeously textured waterfall-style wood countertop.The villa’s two bedrooms each have an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, ceiling fan, iPod dock and balcony. The master bedroom has a queen bed and surround sound system. The second bedroom also has a queen bed , as well as a built-in bunk bed perfect for children. As in the common areas, textures of concrete, wood and white linen create a relaxed, modern feel.Be sure to bring your racquets and workout gear; the Oceansite Facility tennis court and gym are just a 5-minute walk from Su Casa. Hop in the car for the 5-minute drive to the sands of Playa Rajada. It’s a 25-minute drive to a grocery store, clinic and the town of La Cruz, and a 90-minute drive to a hospital and the international airport in Liberia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the dynamic hillside community of Pedregal, Casa Esperanza is a newly constructed luxury vacation rental with accommodations for eighteen. Unlike most other villas in Pedregal, Esperanza has direct walking access to the beachfront, a feature that is rare in this steep hillside area with a beautiful sunset view. And, while maintaining an exceptional level of privacy, it’s just five minutes from the heart of downtown Cabo San Lucas.Whether you’re looking for a secluded place to sit and read, or a spacious environment for a full group hangout, Esperanza has the spot for you. The main living area is massive, and the domed brick-ceiling and numerous windowed openings give it an even grander feel. When the doors are open, the space is filled with fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight and the line between inside and out is delightfully blurry. The lounge area has a plush “L” shaped couch and a couple leather arm chairs facing the dynamic ocean view. The kitchen features high-end stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a social breakfast bar that helps unify the entire open concept atmosphere. The formal dining table has space for ten and resides beneath its own brick-ceiling and an elegant chandelier.Inside Esperanza’s walls you’ll find plenty to keep you busy and entertained, like Satellite television, a Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi. On the terrace there’s an amazing infinity pool and hot tub combination, great for relaxing while looking out upon the ocean view. You’ll also find sun loungers and a fire pit on the balcony.A great way to see Cabo’s dynamic landscapes is from the sea, and Cabo’s marina is the perfect place to charter a tourist or fishing boat for an afternoon of exploring. If there’s a golfer in your group, Cabo del Sol Golf Course is another scenic option. And, for delicious beachfront dining, boutique shopping, and an exciting nightlife, Cabo San Lucas can’t be beat.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Panoramic views of sand and sea unfurl from the lush rooftop lounge atop this sunny palm-lined retreat. Surrounded by turquoise waters and powdery white sand, this 2-storey mansion incorporates beach-inspired elements with a modern atmosphere. Natural light spills into every room, illuminating reclaimed teak floors, natural wood accents, and funky, modern décor. A butler and concierge service free up time to hop on the bikes and meander up the coastline in search of a favourite local beach bar.On the back terrace, a table for 12 lets your crew dine alfresco straight off the barbecue. (Perfect for your complimentary chef to whip up some local cuisine.) Work up a sweat in the gym before taking a refreshing cool down in the aquamarine-hued infinity pool. The media room is a comfy spot to recharge with a favourite flick before heading out to the sunken fire pit—perhaps with a Spanish coffee in hand. Afterwards, fall asleep to the peaceful sound of gentle waves rolling onto the shore beyond. Drive less than 10-minutes to get to restaurants & shops, Grace Bay Beach, and Blue Haven Marina. When you return, mix yourself a drink at the complimentary starter bar, and opt for one of the many sun loungers in, around, or overlooking the ocean. The rooftop lounge space, detailed with sun-bleached stones and scattered bushes, makes for the perfect spot to steal a moment away in the shade.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular beachfront villa is situated on Medano Beach in Cabo San Lucas, with access to the Hacienda Beach Club—one of the finest luxury destinations in Los Cabos. Ample outdoor living spaces fuse with spacious, beautifully decorated interiors to form an enchanting venue for special occasions or serene escapes with loved-ones. Four spacious bedroom suites accommodate families, destination wedding guests, or groups of friends up to eight in size. The vacation rental includes a villa manager, daily housekeeping, and round-the-clock security.The surface of the infinity pool meshes seamlessly with the vast Sea of Cortez, leading your eye to the iconic rocks of Land's End. Elegant lounge chairs invite you to savor the Los Cabos sun, while the shaded outdoor salon welcomes cool gatherings in the ocean breeze. Prepare delectable lunches in the well-appointed outdoor kitchen, and relish them alfresco on the veranda. Stroll the beach at sunset and return to cocktails around the firepit or by the outdoor hearth. At night, the luminous pool and spa welcome soothing soaks under the Pacific stars.The villa's interiors balance modern comforts with the antique elegance of Old Mexico. A broad open wall joins the living room and veranda, imbibing the sea-kissed breeze into the home. Kindle a fire in the evening and sip a fine wine in the salon. Try your hand at Mexican culinary arts in the fully stocked, chef-grade kitchen, and gather around the beautiful dining table for a memorable feast.The master suite features a hand-carved, four-poster king bed opening to a private balcony with breathtaking ocean views, and its ensuite bathroom boasts a lovely soaking tub beside picture windows. Two of the guestrooms have king beds, and one has a pair of twins or split king. Air conditioning, ceiling fans, and high-end entertainment systems keep you cozy during the siesta hour.Guests at the Hacienda can enjoy the resort's outstanding fitness center, world-class spa, beachfront pools, quarter-mile of dreamy beach frontage, and wonderful dining options including Hacienda Cocina y Cantina. Puerto Paraíso shopping center is within walking distance, and the heart of Cabo San Lucas is less than two kilometers away. Drive eleven kilometers to the Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course at Cabo del Sol.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Watch as the sun sets behind nearby islands off the coast of Playa Danta at this breezy beach house in Costa Rica. Walk along the sandy trail, through light greenery and palm trees, to the beach. Work on your tan in a sun lounger on the terrace while the kids splash around in the pool. Later, drive 10-minutes into Potrero for dinner, and maybe a little souvenir shopping.Ocean-inspired turquoise and nautical pinstripes remind guests of the beauty beyond Casa Azul’s soothing walls. Natural wood and stone elements deliver a rustic-chic feel, while white-walls act like a canvas for an extensive collection of one-of-a-kind regional art. Start your mornings with a soak in the master ensuite’s French rub. Then, sip coffee on the sofa in the terrace lounge. After a few moments to yourself, join the group at the stylish picnic table in the kitchen for breakfast.Now that you’re ready for an exciting day, walk to Playa Danta, Las Catalina’s main beach. Conditions on Danta are clear and warm throughout the year, making a perfect setting for snorkeling, paddleboarding, and kayaking. When the tide is low, walk across the sand to Playa Danita for a more secluded beach experience. If there’s a golfer in the group, Vista Ridge Golf and Country Club is a challenging course that winds through lush jungle terrain. After, head to Playa del Coco for tropical cocktails at a beachfront bar.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surround yourself with sandy beachfront at this compound-style villa on the edge of the Riviera Maya in Tulum. 3 fully-equipped beach casitas offer private escapes when you’re not hanging out on the beach, swimming in the pool, or barbequing with the rest of the group. If you can tear yourself away from the sand, bring your camera to the Tulum Ruins and get some shots from the cliffside.Wake up to the sound of palm trees rustling in the sea breeze and waves gently washing ashore. Head outside to do some reading in the hammock underneath 1 of several hay-thatched palapas on the beachfront. When you’re ready for breakfast, fix your self something fresh in your Spanish colonial-style casita, where the soothing decor and warm woods set a relaxing tone.Each casita comes fully equipped with everything a stand-alone unit would have, making Casa Corazon perfect for multi-family getaways. Stretch out on a beach towel or pick a lounge chair in the sun to work on your tan while the kids splash around in the swimming pool. Housekeeping, and the on-site concierge will take care of everything else.The Riviera Maya is full of natural wonders to discover like Laguna de Kaan Luum, an ancient cenote known for its mud bath. Fall in love with burritos all over again at Burrito Amor, famous for wrapping its creations in a banana-leaf. Then, dance the night away to live music at Mojito Bar, where you’ll find a huge selection of tropical cocktails and casual, yet bustling atmosphere.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Near the Caribbean’s gourmet paradise - Grand Case - sits the exclusive, very private enclave of Mont Choisy, home to the stylish Happy Bay Villa. The home’s elegant entrance, with lush tropical gardens and stunning native boulders, creates an inviting stage for this classic French Creole home dressed in soft yellows and trimmed with elegant dark wood details.Entering the villa, the stunning panoramic views dazzle with a brilliant sweep of tropical green mountains and endless blue sea and sky. Anguilla is on the horizon. Just below the deck you see waves crashing on the beach. Surrounding the villa are colorful gardens filled with tropical flowers as well as papaya and banana trees. The blue endless heated pool connects the amazing view to the villa. The spacious horseshoe shaped epi wood terrace is filled with outdoor dining and seating to enjoy the view and wonderful breezes. Little seating niches and a large covered gazebo offer quiet places to relax.The interior great room, with spaces for seating and dining, is fully air condition or opens fully to the tropical breeze. Floor to ceiling glass doors bring in the view. Travertine floors run throughout the interiors. The recently renovated décor has an open and airy attitude in a mix of contemporary and exotic furnishings and accessories in teak woods and soft taupe and cream colors. The modern fully equipped kitchen, open to the view, is tastefully designed in glass tiles, stainless appliances and grey with pops of color.The four bedrooms, with en-suite bathrooms, are off the main salon and under one roof. Each has interior and exterior doors for access to the pool, a small office/work space and fabulous sea views. Three bedrooms are accessible off a large media room with flat screen TV, perfect for teenagers are kids to share this wing of the villa. The master bedroom, located on the opposite side of the villa, is its own private oasis. Private for some but still connected given all bedrooms are under the same roof and all accessible from the inside. Each bathroom is uniquely designed in interesting mixes of materials and stylish fixtures plus they are fully air conditioned.

listing.listing_description: With its breathtaking views of the crystal clear blue waters of the Pacific Ocean’s Bay of Banderas, the naturally lush beauty of the Sierra Madre Mountains, the Marietas islands and the Puerto Vallarta skyline, Casa Kalika oozes ultimate relaxation, contemplative vibes and simple, yet elegant living. Set on the ninth fairway of the famed Jack Nicklaus Golf Course in the exclusive Four Seasons Punta de Mita community, Casa Kalika provides guests with both a coveted location and a private oceanfront setting. Your dream villa awaits!Casa Kalika has all of the necessary amenities for modern living in a hot climate. With air conditioned bedrooms, Wi-Fi access, satellite television, and a stereo sound system, Casa Kalika offers the key amenities required for every vacation—from a corporate retreat to a honeymoon. Equipped with a staff of four that provides attentive, yet unobtrusive service, you will emerge relaxed and refreshed after your stay. The chef will cater to your culinary requests and the estate manager and concierge will accommodate your whims to make sure your visit is full of leisure, comfort and adventure.Casa Kalika was built in a contemporary tropical “palapa style” with modern Balinese influences by Architect Guillermo Michel Renteria, one of the most talented emerging architects from Puerto Vallarta. Built with traditional, natural and organic local materials, this impressively restful private villa captures fluid transition between unrestricted spaces and natural beauty. Live the indoor/outdoor experience to its fullest!With a total of six magnificent bedrooms, this casa can accommodate up to ten guests and two additional children. Each bedroom includes king or double bed, en-suite bathroom with shower, toiletries, air conditioning and a phone. In three of the bedroom suites, enjoy hot tubs and outdoor showers. Unwind at Casa Kalika!Whether you are relaxing in one of the five master suites, lounging under the open palapa living room, sipping a margarita at the wet bar, swimming in the infinity salt water pool, enjoying a cup of espresso in the state of the art kitchen or dining under the stars on the ocean view roof terrace, Casa Kalika gives a sense of continuous intimacy mixed with organic living. A world class vacation should steal you away just as you desire. A stay at Casa Kalika will do just that!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Treat yourself to a luxury holiday amid wild scenery at Monkey Villa. Set in the lush forest above Playa Nacascolo, this beautifully appointed vacation rental offers five-star amenities alongside panoramic views of the unspoiled coastline. With beaches, golf, dining and shopping all a short drive away, there’s something for everyone at this Costa Rica retreat.Listen to the birds singing—and maybe a monkey or two chattering—in the treetops from the villa’s three private balconies, which have sitting and dining areas facing the ocean. Serve refreshments from the wet bar and, as the sun sinks toward the horizon, heat up the gas barbecue for dinner. The property also has features such as Apple TV, Wi-Fi and a wine fridge, and guests are welcome at the community’s two shared swimming pools.Vaulted ceilings and a wall of windows bring warm breezes and tropical sunshine into the villa’s open-plan great room. A sleek sofa, loungers and dining chairs for six offer plenty of room for friends and family to gather, while artwork and upholstery in shades of vibrant green and orange bring the colors of the landscape inside. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a convenient breakfast bar.Monkey Villa has two master bedrooms to rival any honeymoon suite, with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, balconies and ocean views. The third bedroom has two queen beds, as well as its own en-suite bathroom, balcony and pool view.Golfers will love having the Four Seasons golf course less than a 10-minute walk away from the villa’s Papagayo location, while sun-seekers will appreciate the choice of four beaches within a short drive, from Playa Nacascolo to Prieta Beach Club. Find gear for your adventures—or the perfect souvenir—and oceanfront dining in the laid-back beach town of Playa Hermosa. For an unforgettable day trip, make the drive to Rincon de la Vieja Volcano National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape the real world in style at Coracali. This incredible Costa Rica vacation rental has stunning modern architecture and an unbeatable beachfront location in Santa Teresa, along with three bedrooms that can accommodate up to six friends or family members. What it doesn’t have is a TV, meaning you can make a total getaway from the news cycle on your tropical holiday.Feel the ocean breeze, bask in the warm weather and watch the sunset from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, plenty of loungers, a gas barbecue and a dining table. While there is no television, the villa does have a Sonos sound system, so you can use a favorite playlist as the soundtrack to your stay, and Wi-Fi, so you can share photos with friends back at home.Coracali is laid out in a V-shape around the pool, with an open-concept great room in one arm. Wall-to-wall glass showcases the ocean views, and clerestory windows that follow the peaked roofline flood the space with light. A warm, wood-paneled ceiling stretches over the cozy sitting area, a dining table for six and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds and patio access, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning for your comfort on the hottest tropical nights.From the villa’s setting at the point where Playa Santa Teresa meets Playa Cocal, it’s easy to relive your honeymoon with a stroll on the beach, enjoy resort amenities from yoga to dining at nearby Florblanca or take a quick trip to the grocery store. It’s also a short drive to the nearest downtown area with a range of shops, restaurants and nightlife options.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to Kaiku, arguably the most exceptional gated estate in Cayman Kai. This sprawling 5-6 bedroom/4.5 bath villa, with 2 bed/2 bath guesthouse, is bordered by a sixteen-foot fishtail palm privacy hedge, electric gated driveway and vacant lots on either side. Staying at Kaiku provides the utmost of privacy since the home is not visible from the road or gate. Situated on a quiet cove in Cayman Kai, guests will enjoy calm waters, excellent paddle-boarding and minimal wind in the winter. For barefoot ocean swimming, guests will want to visit the Rum Point Club, a mere 300 yards up the street. The Kaibo Marina and restaurants are also only a short 5-10 minute walk away. Accommodations for sixteen and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.This luxurious estate is a perfect getaway for a large active family or 5 adult couples. The estate has a large freshwater pool, heated spa, large private dock and a screened porch. The pool deck has a cabana for shade, plus an outdoor BBQ area complete with sink, fridge and ice maker. 2 outdoor showers can be found on the boat dock and just off the pool deck.One of Kaiku's best features is the exceptionally large private dock and four floating jet ski berths. If you rent a boat or jet skis, you can moor just behind the house. If you arrange a chartered sail or snorkel trip you can simply be picked up off your own private beach! No trips to the public docks necessary. The beach and calm cove are ideal for a rented Hobie cat as well. The owner provides 2 tandem kayaks for complimentary use with a signed waiver. Additional paddleboards and kayaks are available on-site for discount rental with a signed waiver*.Those who have visited the Hawaiian Islands will feel right at home, especially at night when the grounds are illuminated with tiki torches on the beach and a lighting system that rivals Disneyworld's Polynesian Resort. The property is lovingly maintained by a non-resident groundskeeper who tends the beach M-W-F and is available to assist guests as well.The main 5 bedroom house features clean, vaulted architecture, plenty of large windows, a modern kitchen with gas cooktop, 2 washers and dryers, 2 refrigerators, 5 flat screen TVs with HD cable programming, central A/C, a home security system with exterior cameras, an interior/exterior sound system and lighting system. The ground floor waterfront media room opens out to the pool deck and beach._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

listing.listing_description: Down the long driveway lined with coral stone walls and flamboyant, you arrive in the courtyard of this elegant Creole style villa. It is a quiet, private oasis that sets the stage for relaxing outdoor living and a lush tropical view that begins the moment you enter the villa. The large turquoise pool, accented with a visually pleasing sculpture, draws your eye straight to the stately palms and beyond to the cerulean sea.There is a beautiful flow to the house; an almost seamless connection inside to outside. Although very open, it is private. Large covered galleries create multiple options for dining, lounging and sunning. It also creates a cool space for firing up the barbeque. Sleek, yet comfortable, new loungers surround the pool.The décor is serene and tasteful, both inside and outside. The open plan interior living area contains comfortable oversized seating and inside dining. Adjacent to the main living area is the well-equipped, modern kitchen in sleek white, steel and black. All the interior living spaces open to the terrace and the view. The décor is eclectic, contemporary and relaxed in white, beige and taupe accented with driftwood and dark woods. Beautiful paintings, sculpture and exotic African art adds a very distinctive designer touch to the space.Four bedrooms are set off the pool terrace. The décor is in the mood of a luxe boutique hotel; elegant and serene, each room in a different, yet connective, rich neutral color palette; taupe, cream, charcoal, driftwood and metallic. The en suite bathrooms are works of art with travertine tiles, dark stone, marble countertops, sculpted sinks and beautiful fixtures. Several bathrooms overlook the gardens; one overlooks the sea. For larger gatherings, the sister villa, La Nina, shares the same lot and provides an additional two bedrooms. The two also share a tennis court.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. It’s a short drive to beaches such as Plum Bay and Long Bay. You are ten minutes to the airport. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Sweeping ocean views and the gorgeous beaches of Costa Rica’s Papagayo Peninsula await at Villa Serena. With four luxurious bedrooms, three view ocean views, this villa is ideal for a family beach getaway or a golf trip with friends. You’ll appreciate the private atmosphere, inside and out, thanks to the lush tropical greenery of this gated, hillside estate. Nearby, you’ll find golf, tennis, shops, restaurants, natural wonders, and of course, plenty of pristine beachfront.Dark wood trim, creamy-white walls, and elegant stone accents give Villa Serena a luxurious, yet soothing atmosphere, perfect for any occasion. Throughout the open concept living room, you’ll find numerous glass doors to the terrace that slide open to invite the natural sunlight and fresh sea breeze to fill the villa’s interior. With such a spacious common area and plush designer furnishings, you and your guests will love gathering and relaxing, in the ocean-view living room, especially after a day on the beach.Villa Serena’s fully equipped kitchen comes with state of the art appliances, and a casual breakfast bar. There is a formal dining area inside, as well as an alfresco set on the terrace with a beautiful view of the Gulf of Papagayo. The hot tub, swimming pool, and outdoor lounge are also great places to enjoy the view. Back inside, you’ll appreciate Wi-Fi, cable and Apple TV, a Sonos sound system, and air conditioning, as well as daily housekeeping for the duration of your stay.First stop, Prieta Beach Club, of which you’ll have a view. Spending your afternoons soaking up the sun and surf is easy on the Papagayo Peninsula, with Poro Poro, Playa Virador, and Playa Nacascolo, all within a few minutes of home. For the golfers in your group, the legendary Arnold Palmer has designed a namesake course, just one kilometer away at the Four Seasons. If you’re in the mood for shopping, dining, or nightlife, head to Playa Hermosa. And, if you’d like to visit one of Costa Rica’s most prized natural wonders, Rincon de la Vieja Volcano National Park is perfect for an afternoon excursion.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This magnificent beachfront villa is situated in the St. James area of Barbados, along the island's west coast, a short drive from Bridgetown and Sandy Lane Golf Club. Nestled on a lush cliffside, the villa is perched directly above a serene tidal beach (ideal for swimming and snorkeling), and enjoys sweeping views of the turquoise bay. The stylish home balances natural seaside charm with sumptuously furnished interiors, featuring excellent amenities for dining and entertainment. Four superb bedrooms—including a stunning master suite—offer comfortable accommodations for families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eight in size. The villa's talented staff includes housekeeping and a cook for two meals per day.Multiple outdoor living areas inspire dreamy hours under the Caribbean sky. Sip coffee in the morning light before descending to the beach for a swim or stroll. Fire up the barbeque on the main terrace in the afternoon, and gather for alfresco feasts in the sea-kissed breeze. Pour cocktails late in the day and marvel at the panoramic sunset vistas.The interiors feature living and dining areas on both levels, with generous room for group gatherings or private moments. A fully equipped kitchen, secondary kitchen, and lovely bar with wine fridge create a comfortable venue for entertaining guests. French doors open from the elegant salon to the balcony, inhaling the breeze into the home. The villa is air-conditioned and features an office space for business travelers.The master bedroom features rich hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings with exposed beams, a private balcony, and an extraordinary headboard styled from a reclaimed church door. The walk-in closet includes its own washer/dryer, while the deluxe bathroom has a jetted tub. There are two king guestrooms with ensuite bathrooms, and a kid-friendly room with two twin beds. Each room features a Smart TV and air conditioning.The Reef features sparking space for six cars, and is located within minutes of fabulous nightlife, several famous beaches, and the two world-class golf courses at Sandy Lane. Bridgetown and Holetown are both about six kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy the picture-perfect west coast of Barbados from a beautiful new villa at Mirador. Set right on the beach, this newly built luxury property couldn’t be better situated to offer gorgeous views of the turquoise water and easy access to the sugar-soft sand. A full staff and four bedrooms ensure a dream of a tropical holiday for you and up to eight friends or family members.Your stay at this Fitts Village vacation rental includes the services of a cook at two meals per day, housekeeper, gardener and pool tender. Watch the sun move across the sea from private al-fresco living areas with plunge pools, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and dining for eight. After sunset, head indoors to unwind with the help of the satellite TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.Fold-away glass doors connect the outdoor living areas with the open-concept great room, which encompasses living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The space is chic yet inviting, with fresh tones of white, blue and green that echo the lush surroundings.Each of the four bedrooms at Mirador is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, ceiling fan and air conditioning. Three of the four bedrooms open directly to the terrace and have sea views. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are refined and contemporary, with plenty of crisp white set off by soft neutrals.While the villa sits right on its own stretch of beach, it’s just a short drive from some of the island’s most famous—and most romantic—spots, from Paynes Bay Beach and Paradise Beach to celeb-favorite Sandy Lane Beach. If you’d like to to some sightseeing, set a course for the nearby Mount Gay Rum Distillery, book a tee time at Royal Westmoreland Golf Course or sample local fare at relaxed eateries around Holetown and Bridgetown.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Old Trees 7 is an exquisite beachfront villa on Paynes Bay along the West Coast of Barbados. Part of an exclusive complex of luxury, ocean-view residences, the villa features beautiful living and dining areas and elegant island décor. Its three bedrooms accommodate six people, making it an ideal vacation rental for couples, families, and destination wedding guests.At Old Trees—which takes its name from the native Casuarina trees on its property—a lagoon-like swimming pool rests between the villas and the shore. Cross a lovely footbridge to reach the secluded beach, where you'll bathe in the turquoise waters and relax on sun loungers in the sand. Upon returning to your residence, linger outdoors on the covered terrace, sipping cocktails on ocean-view loungers and dining at the alfresco table.From the terrace, three sets of gorgeous French doors invite ocean views and breezes inside. A living room with sumptuous sofas is the ideal setting for spending evening together by the television or piano, or simply enjoying the sunset light. The bright kitchen is fully equipped for preparing delicious drinks and meals, which you'll enjoy at the elegant dining table for six. The naturalistic elegance of the villa's décor, including pickled wooden ceilings and marble floors, accentuates the precious beauty of Barbados. Air conditioning and celling fans will keep you cool on balmy days.The bedrooms are perfect for private afternoons and serene nights. The master bedroom features a king bed and French doors opening to its ocean-view balcony, along with an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The primary guest room also includes a king bed and balcony, along with an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower. The third bedroom, with two twin beds, has a shower/bath combo in its ensuite bathroom.Along with direct access to Payne's Bay Beach, your villa at Old Trees provides an ideal location for enjoying Barbados. Sandy Lane Beach is a beautiful walk or quick car ride away, while the Sandy Lane Golf and Country Club—the top golf club on the island—is about a mile down the road. For restaurants, nightlife, shopping, and essentials, Holetown and Bridgetown are both minutes away by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Connect with friends, family and nature at the beautiful Villa Amaranto. This one-of-a-kind Tulum vacation rental takes inspiration from ancient techniques to create an ambience of modern luxury. And though it’s tucked away in the exclusive La Privada neighborhood, it’s close to dining and shopping downtown Tulum, and the beach.Make the most of the sunshine in private outdoor living areas with two plunge pools, lounging and dining furniture, a gas barbecue and a wet bar. There’s even a rooftop terrace where you can watch the stars come out. Or you might like to head inside to enjoy the satellite TV, integrated sound system, Wi-Fi and wine fridge.The villa was designed by the award-winning local firm Studio Arquitectos of Tulum and named for amaranth, a pale-hued grain that was a staple for the Aztecs. The inspiration comes to life in the villa’s sophisticated neutral color scheme and the pieced-together quality of its walls, which were constructed using a Mayan technique known as chukum. With a slide-away glass wall connecting the terrace to an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, you’ll be spending most of your time in this inviting indoor-outdoor space.Villa Amaranto has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathrooms. The other two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. All three bedrooms have air conditioning, ceiling fans and open to a balcony.A holiday in this part of Mexico can be as relaxed or as active as you like—and a stay at Villa Amaranto makes it easy. Guests are welcome at the community’s shared pool and racquetball court. Plus, the villa is just a 5-minute drive from downtown Tulum, and a short drive or bike ride from its beach, where you can browse for unique finds in the boutiques or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a restaurant.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction site. For more information, contact a Villa Specialist.
