listing.listing_description: _ Please note that this property is next to a construction project, please contact us for more details. _Like an ivory showpiece glinting in the sun, Sandcastle is your private palace right by the sands of the Caribbean Sea. Welcome to sunny Anguilla, a magical island known for its watersports, nightlife and friendly local vibration. Take in the magnificent views of the ever changing hues of the Atlantic Ocean and tropical horizon right at your doorstep. An idyllic boutique villa awaits!The outdoor oasis at Sandcastle includes an expansive second story infinity swimming pool with plenty of deck seating, beach chairs and umbrellas. The consummate entertainer won’t be able to resist whipping up some fabulous cocktails at the poolside bar with a stellar ocean view. Lovely alfresco dining can be a daily event with a barbeque and outdoor dining set under the shaded lanai. The children will love the fenced in and colorful playground with swings, slide, rock climbing wall and lookout fort. Indoors, you will find a media room and kiddie lounge with Xbox, Wii, movies, games and toys. The villa also includes and exercise room so you can keep on top of your workouts while away.The vaulted ceilings and bright interiors foster an airy feeling throughout Sandcastle. The interior dining area makes a sophisticated setting in which to share a special announcement with your loved ones or entourage. The gourmet kitchen comes fully equipped with a center island breakfast bar. A black baby grand piano foreshadows moments of musical whimsy in the living area.Four exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Sandcastle. A private stairway takes you to the grand master suite with a private balcony. The suite features a king size Tempur-Pedic mattress, a large down sofa for movie nights and an alfresco shower. All of the suites include air conditioning, ceiling fans and televisions.While your villa sits right on the sands of the picturesque North Coast of Anguilla, you will find an excellent golf course just minutes away. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. Anguilla’s exceptional Caribbean beauty combined with an effortless living experience make the island an ideal getaway destination. Come enjoy the sunshine at this heavenly abode!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find serenity in the incredible views of mountains and sea from Beaches Edge East. This gorgeous Blowing Point vacation rental is a private oceanfront estate perfectly situated near the water’s edge, local restaurants, golf and more. Book the property on its own for a tranquil escape, or with its sister villa, Beaches Edge West, to host a family reunion or intimate Anguilla destination wedding.Take in the panoramas across the water to the neighboring island of St. Martin from the villa’s stone terrace, where you’ll find plenty of loungers, a pool and a hot tub. A barbecue and shaded al-fresco dining area make it easy to try out fresh local seafood. After a day on the beach or the golf course, share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi or serve refreshments from the wine fridge and put on the sound system.Sleek contemporary architecture and walls of windows frame the views from the expansive open-plan great room, blurring the lines between indoors and out. Watch the sea from one of two sitting areas or a formal dining area that seats eight. Even the fully equipped kitchen echoes the colors of the ocean in its sleek white cabinetry and turquoise backsplash and breakfast bar.The villa’s five bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and lounge areas, can accommodate up to ten guests in island luxury. There are two master bedrooms that rival any honeymoon suite, with king beds and private balconies overlooking the ocean, as well as a third king bedroom. The other two bedrooms have queen beds.Known for its stunning beaches—and lack of mega-resorts—Anguilla is an ideal Caribbean destination for those seeking a tranquil escape. Beaches Edge East makes it easy to bliss out, with a location just steps from a secluded beach area and a short drive from the island’s world-class West End beaches. You’ll also find plenty of restaurant choices and the Cuisinart Resort golf course close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Built on the edge of Puerto Aventuras aquamarine, just off the Caribbean Sea, villa Caleta is ready to host your next amazing luxury retreat. Within the resort’s exclusive, gated community, you’ll be just minutes from their on-site shops, restaurants, beaches, and golf course. Inside, this villa boasts an incredible amount of lounge/common spaces, perfect for larger group gatherings like a family reunion, golf trip with friends, or a relaxing corporate retreat. And, with five en-suite-bedrooms Caleta can accommodate up to fourteen guests with ease.Reminiscent of Beverly Hills mansions, Caleta design is that of the Spanish colonial revivalist style of architecture, with a modern twist on the color scheme and decor. The calming white exterior, terracotta roof tiles, abundance of rich, natural wood grains, and wide openings to the terrace are all trademarks of the luxurious style. Highlighted by the vibrant green of palm trees and a hay-thatched palapa, this private vacation home checks all the boxes of an iconic Mexican luxury rental.Caleta’s terrace is the perfect place to enjoy the beautiful Mexican climate. Cool off in the infinity pool. Gather with friends around the wet bar. Barbeque some fresh fish from a local market and have lunch on the alfresco dining set. Or, take an afternoon nap in one of the lounge chairs or hammock, it’s up to you. If you’d prefer the air conditioning inside, curl up on the sofa and watch some television or catch up with the world on the villa’s Wi-Fi.Puerto Aventura is located just off the shore from an incredible coral reef system, rich with aquatic life and ideal for snorkeling, diving, and fishing. There are also plenty of opportunities to learn more about the natural environment with guided tours, dolphin swimming experiences, or a visit to the Bel Air Animal Park. If you feel like doing some exploring, either by car or a chartered boat, there are plenty of beautiful cities and ports to visit up and down the Riviera Maya.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning two-bedroom contemporary villa is the perfect hideaway for a honeymoon couple, a small family or two couples. The stylish grand entrance creates a dramatic stage for a breathtaking sea view - sunsets are pure magic.The grand living room is open, airy with an opulent contemporary attitude. Floor to ceiling doors disappear into the wall providing unobstructed views and breezes. Sand color travertine tiles flow seamlessly from indoors to outdoors. Gorgeous designer furniture detailed in beautiful dark woods, comfortable upholstered seating and tasteful art create a relaxing interior lounging area. The color scheme is relaxing in cream, off white and taupe. The sleek and stylish open plan kitchen is open to the view and the exterior dining room, while the barbeque is adjacent to the kitchen. Throughout the villa, pots filled with tropical plants dot the terraces creating a Feng shui attitude.The two very large and equal size bedrooms are places of relaxing solitude furnished in cream bedding, beautiful fabrics, soft sand polished travertine tiles and beautifully inlaid woods. The spa style bathrooms are simply gorgeous, each one in unique combination of luxe woods, travertine and stainless fixtures. Both have oversized walk-in showers.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. You are 2 minutes to the grocery at Puerto Cupecoy and another five minutes to the airport. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Beach Enclave 4 is located along coveted International Drive, a prestigious cul-de-sac known for its designer homes. The area offers stunning views of Turks and Caicos’ North Shore, the protected Princess Alexandra National Park and the teeming barrier reef. This private neighborhood offers tranquility with low density and scant traffic. Right on the oceanfront of Babalua Beach and less than ten minutes from Grace Bay, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate Caribbean holiday!The combination of private beach access, easy and breezy living and magnificent views along with the vacation rental’s luxury services and management make this property a one-of-a-kind real estate opportunity in Providenciales. Beach Enclave 4 is generously embedded in the lush, natural vegetation of the islands with less than one home per acre. Outdoor perks include a swimming pool, an alfresco dining area for eight, a barbeque, fire pit, an outdoor shower and plenty of sun loungers. The private beach area is accessible via a carved limestone staircase.High ceilings and a predominantly white decorative scheme keep the feelings light and bright at this magnificent holiday home. Subtle wooden accents in the great room help keep the atmosphere balanced and grounded. Enjoy dinner at the formal dining table that is uniquely hewn to preserve the original shape and grains of the tree. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and an espresso machine. Wi-Fi access is free.The four stunning bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. The two master suites feature king size beds, dual vanities, alfresco showers and balconies with ocean views. All of the suites offer television, ceiling fans.Don’t forget – group yoga sessions are included with your reservation. Get into that meditative state you’ve been craving for so long! You will also be within easy driving distance of the Provo Golf Club. We recommend this villa for a family vacation, a decadent honeymoon or couples’ retreat or a special event such as a wedding or anniversary. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover an oasis of luxury and style just North of Puerto Vallarta at the Punta Mita Mexico Resort. World class beaches, stunning architecture, fine dining, water sports and golf are all readily available within the authentic culture of Mexico. Hacienda de Mita 405 is also the perfect base camp for exploring the wonders of Puerto Vallarta, Sayulita and Yelapa. Come get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!The beautiful infinity-edge swimming pool with opposing contours sits right next to the pristine sands of a picture-perfect beach dotted with palm trees. Or enjoy a soothing soak in the bubbles of the outdoor hot tub. The grounds at Hacienda de Mita 405 also feature a lovely alfresco dining set and a terrace with a lounge area. The interiors feature HDTV, Apple TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and a wine fridge. There’s even a telescope for stargazing. Guests receive complimentary access to a six passenger golf cart with a sound system. Your reservation includes housekeeping.Hacienda de Mita 405 integrates modern, functional design with a traditional Mexican feel. This single-story, third floor condo offers 3,546 square feet of indoor and outdoor living space. The main living space extends onto the terrace that offers magnificent views of the garden and Jack Nicklaus Golf Course as well as direct access to the garden and pool area. The fully equipped kitchen features luxury finishes with marble floors and coverings throughout, chancellery with template glass and double crystal windows as well as tropical solid wood. One additional flex-room with a bath and laundry area can be used as service quarters, extra bedroom, media room or studio.Three fabulous bedrooms and additional bedding accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans and televisions. You will have your choice of king beds, queens and a twin. Both master suites feature jetted tubs and walk-in closets.During your stay at Hacienda de Mita 405, you will be just a few minutes by golf cart from tennis and golf. Ask our dedicated concierge about the Premier-Golf Membership with access to the Pacifico and Bahia Golf Courses, the Resident’s Beach Club, Kupuri Beach Club, the restaurants at the Four Seasons and St. Regis and the fitness facility. Your dream villa in Punta Mita awaits!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get a glimpse of the vintage charm of Puerto Vallarta at Casa Cosmos. Designed by famed Mexican architect Alfredo Terrazas in the 1960s for his own use, this luxury Conchas Chinas vacation rental was one of the first villas in the area and today stands above one of its only remaining private beaches. A full staff and seven suite-style bedrooms make this a wonderful alternative to a resort for a family holiday or a romantic retreat for a honeymoon-worthy getaway.The heart of Casa Cosmos is its oceanfront terrace, crafted in natural stone and lined with lounge chairs, a sun bed and hammocks. Have a swim in the infinity pool, which is connected to the jetted tub by a rock slide, or take the steps down to the beach to explore in the kayaks. Rinse off in the outdoor shower and finish the day by sitting down to the al-fresco dining area for one of the two daily meals prepared by the villa’s cook. In addition to the meals, your stay at the property includes the services of a housekeeper, houseman and house manager.Known for designing a showstopping villa in Cuernavaca for the heiress Barbara Hutton and the former Camino Real Hotel in Puerto Vallarta, Terrazas took inspiration from traditional Mexican architecture to give Casa Cosmos a classic, charming look. The main living areas are under a thatched-roof palapa, allowing the ocean breezes to pass through, and feature stone walls with built-in planters, woven sofas and chairs, and plenty of potted palms. Even the fully equipped kitchen opens to a convenient breakfast bar.The main house at Casa Cosmos has four bedrooms with king beds, day beds, and pool access, and one bedroom with a king bed and private balcony; all have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. In-laws or couples can stay in the casita, which has a king bed, queen bed on the mezzanine, and its own jetted tub, kitchenette and living spaces, and kids will love sleeping in the “dormitorio,” which has two bunk beds and an en-suite bathroom.Though the villa boasts a superb setting right on the Pacific Ocean, it’s also close to popular sights if you’d like to see more of the area. Playa Palmares and Playa Los Muertos are less than a 10-minute drive from the property, and the iconic Malecon esplanade is 11 minutes away by car. For dining, shopping and nightlife, make the 25-minute drive into central Puerto Vallarta.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The ocean peeks through curtains of palm fronds outside the louvered windows of this minimalist home on Barbados’ west coast. Inspired by the simple layout of the island’s traditional chattel houses, this contemporary villa uses wood-paneled ceilings to shade and slatted walls to invite cooling breezes. Follow the path to golden Gibbes Beach for a swim in the shallows or nap in the shade. Watch the waves from a lounger on the oceanfront deck, toss local seafood on the barbecue for a quick lunch or dinner, and soak in the al-fresco hot tub as the sun sets over the water. An Apple TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, and wine fridge make light work of finding evening entertainment. Your holiday at this vacation rental also includes the services of a cook and housekeeper.A koi pond greets you at the entrance to this luxury property, creating a tranquil feel and hinting at the ocean views to come. That calm pervades the open-concept living areas, from a sitting area with sofas clustered around a Noguchi coffee table to a dining table for eight. The neutral palette and sleek surfaces continue in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the three bedrooms at Shoestring has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; one of them also has a honeymoon-suite-worthy private balcony with a hot tub. Together, the bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to six friends or family members.St. Peter is known for having some of the best beaches on Barbados, and Gibbes Beach—just in front of the villa—is no exception. It’s a quiet stretch of golden sand, ringed by tall trees for shade and opening to relatively calm, shallow waters. Depending on the tide, you can also wade north to Mullins Beach for an ice cream from the stand or a cocktail from the beach bar.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: One of Jamaica’s most enchanting villas, Endless Summer is a turreted mansion with red roofs and breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. A sweeping white stone staircase curves gracefully from the foyer to a gallery balustrade encircling the living room topped by the highest dome of this spectacular vacation rental. Just minutes from idyllic golf courses and attractions including Rockland’s Bird Sanctuary and the luminescent Glistening Waters, experience Jamaica in style with Luxury Retreats!The palatial grounds at Endless Summer include a lovely swimming pool and a separate hot tub. With an alfresco dining area for ten, an outdoor kitchen, a barbeque and a wet bar, this property is a dream come true for the magnanimous entertainer or a family holiday. Bose speakers throughout provide surround sound in the villa, on the verandahs and balconies and by the pool. Your reservation includes chef, housekeeping and butler services.The interiors showcase mushroom-colored walls crisply trimmed in white. Mediterranean-style floors were custom made on-site, creating an overall palate of soft minimalistic colors. On fine Lenox china, dinners will be served in the downstairs dining alcove, north verandah or on the upstairs balcony as the sun sets over the sea. From the gallery, as from the bedrooms, a wall of glass doors opens to the deep wraparound porch and vistas over the golf course and the turquoise waters on the horizon.Seven gorgeous bedrooms accommodate up to sixteen guests at this non-smoking villa. Four sleeping quarters are located in the main house, each with a balcony. The carriage house offers two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and can also make a great bet for the couple on honeymoon. Alana's Retreat accomodates four guests over 18 years and older in two queen size beds. The master suite in the main house features a king sized bed, dual vanity, jetted tub, walk-in closet and lounge area.Downtown Montego Bay and the hip strip are just fifteen minutes away from Endless Summer. Half Moon with its private beach, tennis, fitness center, water sports and dolphin lagoon is only five minutes downhill. This spacious residence has also become a favorite for hosting fantasy tropical weddings. From a marriage ceremony on the upper balcony with adequate space for many guests, to a grand reception on the wide verandah, to the dramatic tossing of the bridal bouquet from the upper gallery – say, “I do!”Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: For sun, sand and an incredibly elegant ambience, whisk yourself away to the island idyll of Coral Pavilion. This Turks and Caicos vacation rental is right on the sugar-white sands of Grace Bay Beach, but rises above other oceanfront retreats with its stately great-house-inspired architecture. Five bedrooms and a full staff are ready to pamper parties of up to ten friends and family members on a luxury holiday-or just one couple on a decadent honeymoon.Your stay at Coral Pavilion begins with a complimentary airport transfer, welcome drinks and cold towels, and includes the services of a private chef, butler and housekeeper. Guests are also welcome to bicycles and non-motorized water sports, as well as the gym and resort facilities at nearby Seven Stars. Of course, there's always the temptation of the villa's own heated pool, oceanfront lounging and dining areas, and a sound system and Wi-Fi that extend to the beach.Inspired by the work of renowned designer Oliver Messel, whose projects ranged from ballet sets and hotel suites to vacation homes for British royalty, the residence takes its cues from the great houses of Barbados for a look that's grand yet inviting. Inside its coral-stone walls, the living and dining areas exude tropical refinement with their white upholstery and graceful chandeliers. The fully equipped kitchen is more exuberant, with its custom tile and Messel green cabinetry, and includes a serving area and butler's pantry.Coral Pavilion has four bedrooms with king beds, including a stunning master suite with its own lounge area, office and ocean-view terrace, and one bedroom with two twin beds. Accents such as ornately framed mirrors, painted ceramic stools and intricate relief panels used as artwork give the bedroom suites an intriguing touch of the exotic.The villa opens to 120 feet of beach frontage on gorgeous Grace Bay, famous for its soft sands and clear turquoise waters, and its only 5 minutes from the oceanfront shopping and dining along the same beach. Book a fishing excursion at the nearby Blue Haven Marina, tee off at the Provo Golf & Tennis Club or admire the island's natural wonders at the pristine Princess Alexandra National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This elegant Spanish-Caribbean style villa is designed to capture the views and maximize outdoor living. The covered courtyard entrance with its Old World wooden doors, tiled floors and exotic plantings creates the perfect introduction to a stunning tropical view. Framed by royal palms and pink bougainvillea, the view is a panoramic vista filled with shades of blue from the sapphire sea to the deep blue sky; gorgeous in daytime; spectacular at sunset.Beautifully designed gardens surround the house and terraces. Epi wood decks on multi levels offer endless options for dining, lounging and sunning. You can be private or together with your friends or family. The upper deck flows off the main indoor living area. Under wide covered gazebos, you can lounge, dine or fire up the barbeque. Step down to the gorgeous lower level for a swim in the inviting pool surrounded by covered terraces and sundecks.The interior great room, with terracotta floors and dark Spanish style vaulted ceilings, is cool, breezy and light. Pocket doors open to the view. Comfortable oversized seating in white and taupe against dark woods set an elegant, low-key atmosphere for lounging and dining. Spanish inspired doors and windows are featured thought out the house for an exotic touch. The well-equipped new kitchen is sleek and contemporary.There are four bedrooms. Two are in private casitas off the upper deck. Spacious and comfortable, each room’s décor is a blend of serene whites and tans mixed with dark wood. Charming Spanish style shutters create privacy. Both casita bedrooms have sea and garden views as well as private patios. The gorgeous spa style bathrooms, with walk in showers, are designed in travertine accented with dark woods. Two additional bedrooms connect to the interior living space. It’s a wonderful set up for children. One room has bunk beds. The adjacent room has a king bed. The two share a spa style bathroom.Although secluded, you’re close to amenities. Long Bay Beach and Cupecoy Beach are only 2 minutes away. It’s also a short drive to Porto Cupecoy for grocery shopping, restaurants including island favorite Mario’s Bistro. Another 5 minutes from here and you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven while only a 10-minute drive to the international airport.Read our insider guide to Hacienda in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/06/vacation-diary-6-friends-enjoy-endless-caribbean-sunshine/)

listing.listing_description: Stone mosaics swirl up to the cobalt walls of this cliffside villa in Costa Careyes. Though it’s hidden from the outside world by 2 rock faces and palm-strewn gardens, this fully staffed retreat has panoramic Pacific views from its palapa-covered decks and infinity pool. When you’re ready to emerge from glorious seclusion, it’s 5 minutes to ceviche and cocktails at Playa Rosa Beach Club. Savor the sight of the sunlight sparkling on the ocean from beneath an umbrella on a lounger by the infinity pool, or follow a staircase down to a stone grotto and water access. Though the villa feels private—its name translates to “love nest,” after all—it’s connected to the rest of the world via Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The villa’s wave-like stone motifs and brilliant blue walls echo the natural Costalegre landscape of rock faces and cerulean sea. The main living and dining areas draw their inspiration from traditional homes of Mexico, housed in open-sided, palapa-covered pavilions. And while cook service is included in your holiday, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Each of the 3 bedrooms at this vacation rental is a honeymoon-worthy hideaway with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, and ocean views. Two of the bedrooms have their own balconies, and the third opens directly to the pool terrace. In contrast to the color-soaked common areas, the bedrooms have crisp white walls warmed up by wood accents. A stay at Nido de Amor gives you the luxury of popping down to the beach club for a fresh seafood lunch or cocktail hour by torchlight, with Playa Rosa just a 5-minute drive away. Make new friends around the pools at El Careyes Club, 8 minutes away, or bring the family for a match at Careyes Polo Club. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
